alert.note: Alert for Sweet Grass; Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 5:36PM MDT until further notice by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Wheatland. In south central Montana, Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 845 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 536 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Timber Creek, Cherry Creek, Haymaker Creek, Little Elk Creek, Lebo Creek, Musselshell River, South Fork Musselshell River, Miller Creek, Agnes Creek, Spring Creek, Dry Fork Daisy Dean Creek, Hopley Creek, American Fork, Cayuse Creek, Cinnamon Creek, Fish Creek, Antelope Creek, Big Elk Creek, Roberts Creek, Mud Creek, Daisy Dean Creek and Sweet Grass Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harlowton and Twodot. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places.
